title: "PACCAR begins extensive field test with self driving trucks"
excerpt: "DAF’s parent company PACCAR and FedEx have begun an extensive field test in the US with self-driving trucks. The vehicles will be driven on the route between Dallas and Houston – a journey of around 400 kilometres."
